channel.title: Research on Bret Staudt Willet, Ph.D.
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Bret Staudt Willet, Ph.D.

item.title: ISSDL Webinar: Self-Directed Learning Spanning Contexts
Innovation Hub Faculty Spotlight: Context-Aware Self-Teaching
Promotion & Tenure Articles
item.description: For my Promotion & Tenure process, I was asked to identify several journal articles that exemplify my work.

item.title: Promotion & Tenure Materials
item.description: Following the example of my friend Josh Rosenberg, here I am sharing the narrative I wrote for my third-year review this month.

item.title: New Study: Game Developers' Self-Directed Learning
item.description: Study Overview In this study, we are exploring self-directed learning (SDL) among game developers, investigating how you acquire and enhance skills in an industry marked by rapid technological evolution and shifting consumer interests.

item.title: Press: Learning without Limits
item.description: The Torch Magazine - Spotlight I was really grateful to be featured in a spotlight article in The Torch magazine by Melissa Powell, Communications Manager for the College of Education, Health, and Human Sciences.

item.title: Third-Year Review
item.description: Following the example of my friend Josh Rosenberg, here I am sharing the narrative I wrote for my third-year review this month.

item.title: Farewell tidytags
item.description: I am sad to announce that Josh Rosenberg and I have decided to archive our R package, tidytags.

item.title: Sloan Grant: Computing Terminology and Equitable Outcomes for Graduate Students at MSIs
item.description: Project Overview This research project, entitled “Aligning Graduate Education and Workforce Opportunities: A Robust, Equity-Focused Landscape Scan of Computing Terminology” is supported by the Alfred P.

item.title: Research Statement
item.description: I study online learning environments. I research networked learning at the intersection of educational psychology, instructional technology, and information science.
